scripts.db:console: docker compose run postgres psql -h postgres -U postgres -d avalanche_dev
scripts.docker:db:migrate: docker compose run backend pnpm db:migrate
scripts.docker:db:migrate:undo: docker compose run backend pnpx knex migrate:down
scripts.populate: docker compose run backend && pnpm run build && node ./src/implementations/get_latest_transactions.ts
scripts.rebuild:be: docker compose build backend && docker compose rm --force --stop backend && docker compose up -d backend
